ðŸ“– Summary: GenAIScript is a framework for programmatically building and managing prompts for LLMs using JavaScript or TypeScript. It provides tools and abstractions for working with prompts, integrates seamlessly with Visual Studio Code, and supports various LLMs and data formats, enabling developers to automate and streamline their GenAI workflows.
